sentence: Wednesday's session closes with the NASDAQ Composite Index 52.38 This is the 3rd straight day of increase for the index.
The total shares traded for the NASDAQ was over 2.34 billion.
Advancers stocks led declining by 1.62 to 1 ratio.
There were 1930 advancers and 1191 decliners for the day.
On the NASDAQ Stock Exchange 48 stocks reached a 52 week high and 18 those reaching lows totaled.
The most active, advancers, decliners, unusual volume and most active by dollar volume can be monitored intraday on the Most Active Stocks page.
The NASDAQ 100 index closed up .77% for the day; a total of 55.7 points.
Regeneron Pharmaceuticals, Inc. ( REGN ) had the largest percent change down (-2.06%) while Take-Two Interactive Software, Inc. ( TTWO ) had the largest percent change gain rising 6.88%.
The Dow Jones index closed up .58% for the day; a total of 148.23 points.
Home Depot, Inc. (The) ( HD ) had the largest percent change down (-1.55%) while UnitedHealth Group Incorporated ( UNH ) had the largest percent change gain rising 2.59%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
